p: The determination reduction were based on the amount of Fe 4(Fe[CN] 6) produced as an indicator. The antioxidant can reduce potassium ferricyanide, and the ferrous ions were used to produce Prussian-blue. Fe 4 (Fe [CN] 6) has maximum absorption peak at 700 nm. A greater absorbance value indicates that a sample has stronger reducing power. Iron ion reducing ability was measured using kit according to the manufacturerâ€™s instructions.
